title: Arewa Data Science Fellowship
text:
ArewaDS Application is Open
The Arewa Data Science Fellowship application is open. The Arewa Data Science fellowship (ADSF) provides an opportunity to learn from data scientists and machine learning experts. The fellowship is a 16-week-long free training that provides a hands-on approach to data science, machine learning and deep learning.
The skills and knowledge acquired during the fellowship will help participants pursue careers in data science, machine learning and research. Our goal is to inspire the next generation of researchers in the North and provide them with the tools they need to be successful. The ADSF fellowship provides support with a monthly stipend during the program.
Applications will be judged based on the strength of the motivation of the applicant, academic record, and scholarly potential. Contact us at: arewadatascience@gmail.com Apply here: https://docs.google.com/…/1FAIpQLSe7bzvOO1…/viewform

title: ArewaDS FellowShip
text:
Projects
Learn by doing. Theory is nice, but nothing replaces actual experience. -Tony Hsieh
Our mentors from Universities across Nigeria and beyond will guide fellows to undergo interesting projects on data science and machine learning depending on experience and background.
List of Projects

title: ArewaDS FellowShip
text: Arewa Data Science Fellowship A 16-week-long free training that provides a hands-on approach to data science, machine learning and deep learning ABOUT News about ArewaDS Felloship and Blogs by our Mentors and Fellows News/Blog

title: ArewaDS FellowShip
text:
Arewa Data Science Fellowship
As part of our desire and motivation to train marginalized students, Arewa Data Science Academy already have student mentoring programs. We offer Nigerian university students seminars on data science, machine learning and related fields.
We also offer free training on weekends to affected marginalized students. This year (2023), we are offering a more structured and sreamlined training, being sponsored by Google Research, TensorFlow and HausaNLP, Bayero University Kano. We are targeting underrepresented groups including but not limited to Women and Students from rural communities and communities affected by insecurity.
